entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
